tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ev_components_warranty (
  component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  component_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  warranty_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  warranty_end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  warranty_period_in_months INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ElectricVehicles (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    production_year INT NOT NULL,
    warranty_expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Components (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    component_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    warranty_expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ComponentWarranty (
    component_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    warranty_provider_id UUID NOT NULL,
    warranty_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    warranty_expiry_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES Components(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (warranty_provider_id) REFERENCES WarrantyProviders(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComponentWarranty (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    warranty_period INT NOT NULL,
    warranty_start_date DATE,
    warranty_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleWarranty (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    warranty_period INT NOT NULL,
    warranty_start_date DATE,
    warranty_end_date DATE
);
